name: Fractured Mail Order Catalogues Online Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Land's End&lands end& lands' end.

	Based in Dodgeville, Wisconsin.

Pottery Barn.

	Based in San Francisco, California.

Victoria's Secret&Victorias Secret.

	Based in Columbus, Ohio. By the way, if you haven't read Billy Collins's poem about the Victoria's Secret catalogue, you MUST! Billy Collins was the 2001-2003 United States Poet Laureate.

questions.correct: Bed, Bath, and Beyond & Bed Bath and Beyond&Bed, Bath and Beyond
questions.explanation:
Bed, Bath, and Beyond & Bed Bath and Beyond&Bed, Bath and Beyond.

	Did you ever see the Simpson's episode in which there's a gun store called Blood Bath and Beyond?

Banana Republic.

	Based in Grove City, Ohio.

J. Crew & J Crew

	Based in Lynchburg, Virginia.

Abercrombie and Fitch.

	Based in Ridgely, Maryland.

Crate and Barrel.

	Based in Naperville, Illinois.

Williams Sonoma & Williams-Sonoma.

	Based in San Francisco, California. Where I registered when I got married--how fun THAT was, like a pretend shopping spree!
